charges.charge_description: 21:846=ND.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS Conspiracy to distribute and possess with intent to distribute, a quantity of cocaine, a Schedule II Controlled Substance (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Eighteen (18) months imprisonment; three years supervised release and $100 special assessment. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE Distribute a quantity of cocaine, a Schedule II Controlled Substance (2-3)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismiss Count(s) 2,3, and 4 on government's motion (2-3)

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE Aiding and Abetting in the distribution of cocaine, a Schedule II Controlled Substance (4)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismiss Count(s) 2,3, and 4 on government's motion (4)

charges.charge_description: 21:846=ND.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS Conspiracy to distribute and possess with intent to distribute a quantity of cocaine, a Schedule II Controlled Substance (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Thirty (30) months imprisonment; three years supervised release and $100 special assessment. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE Distribute and aid and abet each other in distributing a quantity of cocaine, a Schedule II Controlled Substance (4)
